Name: ArkanoidSmoking
About the game: Would you like to quit smoking? If yes, then play in ArkanoidSmoking. Destroy tutu, Beware emoticons with their mouths open.. The game is waiting for you More than 10 interesting levels And more than 10 music tracks that will help you relax during the game process. Who knows, maybe this game will help you get rid of the addiction. And have a good time.
